publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2092 Scott Barrie: Lauder College, Dunfermline - Scottish Employer of the Year—That the Parliament congratulates Lauder College in Dunfermline on being named Working Families/Lloyds TSB Scotland Scottish Employer of the Year 2004; considers that this important accolade demonstrates that the further education sector contains good and progressive employers who can demonstrate excellence in management and governance, and hopes that other employers in both the public and private sectors will follow the excellent example of Lauder College as an employer.

S2M-2092 Lauder College, Dunfermline - Scottish Employer of the Year (lodged on 30 November 2004) Bill Butler*, Jackie Baillie*, Michael McMahon*, Pauline McNeill*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Mike Watson*, Richard Baker*, Christine May*, Paul Martin*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Donald Gorrie*, Sarah Boyack*, Bruce Crawford*, Murdo Fraser*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Bristow Muldoon*

S2M-2092 Scott Barrie: Lauder College, Dunfermline - Scottish Employer of the Year—That the Parliament congratulates Lauder College in Dunfermline on being named Working Families/Lloyds TSB Scotland Scottish Employer of the Year 2004; considers that this important accolade demonstrates that the further education sector contains good and progressive employers who can demonstrate excellence in management and governance, and hopes that other employers in both the public and private sectors will follow the excellent example of Lauder College as an employer. Supported by: Bill Butler, Jackie Baillie, Michael McMahon, Pauline McNeill, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Mike Watson, Richard Baker, Christine May, Paul Martin, Mr Frank McAveety, Ms Wendy Alexander, Donald Gorrie, Sarah Boyack, Bruce Crawford, Murdo Fraser, Dr Elaine Murray, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Bristow Muldoon, Cathie Craigie*, Marlyn Glen*, Alex Neil*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Maureen Macmillan*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Janis Hughes*
S2M-2092 Lauder College, Dunfermline - Scottish Employer of the Year (lodged on 30 November 2004) Ms Sandra White*, Trish Godman*
S2M-2092 Lauder College, Dunfermline - Scottish Employer of the Year (lodged on 30 November 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2092 Lauder College, Dunfermline - Scottish Employer of the Year (lodged on 30 November 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-2092 Lauder College, Dunfermline - Scottish Employer of the Year (lodged on 30 November 2004) Cathy Peattie*, Karen Whitefield*
S2M-2092 Lauder College, Dunfermline - Scottish Employer of the Year (lodged on 30 November 2004) Rosie Kane*
S2M-2092 Lauder College, Dunfermline - Scottish Employer of the Year (lodged on 30 November 2004) Susan Deacon*
S2M-2092 Lauder College, Dunfermline - Scottish Employer of the Year (lodged on 30 November 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
